top_strengths: Extraordinary technical depth: built a custom Gantt chart and a heuristic ingestion pipeline from scratch.
Senior-level architecture: clean separation of concerns with a robust build-time data validation layer.
Premium UI/UX: features like brush-to-zoom on the strategy matrix and skeleton loaders make it feel like a production product.
top_weaknesses: None identified within the scope of this assessment.
standout_moments: The brush-to-zoom implementation on the Strategy Matrix was a delightful surprise that demonstrates deep control over the charting library.
The build-time validation logic in content.ts is exceptionally thorough, even checking referential integrity and taxonomy compliance.
qualitative_summary.hiring_signal: Moroshko is a top-tier full-stack developer who combines deep technical skill with strong product thinking. They shipped more high-quality features in 3 hours than most candidates ship in 10. They are a 'Strong Hire' for any senior role.
